availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Cumberland County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Polly Williams. Father of Caleb Williams, Dudley W. Williams, and Candor W. Williams. Farmer in Cumberland County in 1860. Owned five enslaved persons in 1860.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Cumberland County, Cumberland, p. 325. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Cumberland County, District 2, p. 56. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Cumberland County, District 2, p. 9. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Cumberland County, Burkesville, p. 42.
